resources.string: When we buy a beer, always stay with that cruel doubt about which is more worthwhile, bottle, tin or would be better then a litr√£o. To resolve this problem, we developed the TAP Hinds SI. With it you can drink much and what is best, paying much less. Select the desired option, enter the price and calculate which option is more advantageous!

The TAP Cervas SI was inspired by the Calculadora de Bebidas and developed by Prof. M.Sc. Gesiel Rios in the course of Advanced Topics in Programming along with the students of the class 2014.2 at the Higher Education of Internet Systems - SI of the Faculty of Education of the Bacabal - FEBAC.
What drink with the best cost-benefit ratio ?
The order is the cheapest to the most expensive
